description.lang: HUB iO is the Main controller of your Simon 100 iO Home. It allows you manage your entire Z-Wave network and add new features to your life making it more confortable.Use it through your Simon 100 APP in order to manage features and configurations of your switches and sockets, no matter if you are at home or not.

Z-Wave Plus Lifeline.COMMAND_CLASS_BASIC_REPORTIt is sent to the associated nodes when the load changes state:ON -> 0xFF // OFF -> 0x00COMMAND_CLASS_METER_REPORT_V4It is sent to the associated nodes when the power consumed varies more than 10%Electric meter, Consumed, Watts, Size 4, Precision 1, Value (W)COMMAND_CLASS_DEVICE_RESET_LOCALLY_NOTIFICATIONThe associated nodes are sent when the device is deleted from the Z-Wave network
COMMAND_CLASS_BASIC_REPORTIt is sent to the associated nodes when the load changes its state:ON -> 0xFF // OFF -> 0x00
Turns ON the Central LED
Turns off the center LED
Turn on the center LED
Delays the load activation after an ON request.Values must be SET in HEX format
Disables timing
Sets a timing with a range of (1-127sec)
Sets a timing with range of (1-127min)
Sets the time that Load will be activated after it is switch ON.Values must be SET in HEX format
Disables timing
Sets a timing with range of (1-127min)
Sets a timing with range of (1-127sec)
Sets LED1 informing about socket load state.
LED1 remains OFF and only informs of load state during 5 sec. after pressing the button.
LED1 always shows the load state
Locks the HUB iO pushbutton.
Enables the pushbutton to control the load
Disables the action of the pushbutton on the load

Write only parameter with 2 possible values:0x9867 -> Allows remove the device from the network without performing any action on HUB iO. Parameters, Groups and Z-Wave status are restored to the default values.0x4312 -> Allows set all device configuration values to default the exception of Long Pulse Lock configuration.
Performs a Reset devault
Performs configuration default values process
Delays the load deactivation after an OFF request.Values must be SET in HEX format
Disables timing
Sets a timing with range of (1-127sec)
Sets a timing with range of (1-127min)
Defines the load state when HUB iO is powered
After a reset the load starts Off
After a reset the load recovers the last value
Defines the action to be performed when pushbutton is short pressed
TOGGLE, A short press switches the
ON. A short press activates the load
OFF. A short press deactivates the load
Limits the mximum load that can be powered by the socket of HUB iO.
Disables custom consumption limit
Sets the power in Watts that is supported (once the load is over, it is disconnected).
Enables a fast blinking of central LED
The central LED flashes for 5 seconds at a frequency of 0.1s
Allows to know the load state and value
Load is OFF
Load is ON
Locks any press hold accin .
Hold press works as expected
Blocks HOLD press actions from 2 to 30s and hold press of 30s sets de HUb in learning proces but not resets it.
Sets the LEDs lighting intensity.
Disables the beacon function.
Sets the intensity of the beacon LEDs.
